DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective trial investigate effect multiple-dose faldaprevir ( FDV ) single-dose pharmacokinetics cyclosporine tacrolimus
DOC.brief_title: Investigation Potential Drug-drug Interactions Between Faldaprevir Immunosuppressant Drugs Cyclosporine Tacrolimus
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Healthy male females subject Age 18 50 year ( incl . ) Body mass index ( BMI ) 18.5 29.9 kg/m2 ( incl . ) Signed date write informed consent prior admission study Exclusion criterion : Any find medical examination ( include blood pressure , pulse rate ECG ) deviate normal judge clinically relevant investigator . Systolic blood pressure ( BP ) less 100 mmHg 140 mmHg . Diastolic BP le 60 mmHg 90 mmHg . Pulse rate ( PR ) less 50 bpm 90 bpm . Any laboratory value outside reference range investigator considers clinical relevance Any evidence concomitant disease judge clinically relevant investigator Positive QuantiFERONTB Gold InTube
